languages.text: "Благодарю вас. К сожалению, люди губернатора оказались не готовы к местным опасностям..." {n}Дознаватель бросает взгляд на обмякшее тело в цветах губернаторской стражи и коротко вздыхает.{/n} "...а мои способности не позволяют извлекать обломки клинков из живота. Я рассчитываю, что свита Вольного Торговца лучше подготовлена к испытаниям, нежели обычные вояки из штаба".

"Thank you. Regrettably, the governor's people showed themselves to be unprepared for the perils of this place." {n}The Interrogator glances at the limp body clad in the colours of the governor's wardens, and sighs briefly.{/n} "And extracting blade shards from a person's stomach is beyond my powers. I hope that a Rogue Trader's retinue will prove more capable than a group of soldiers fresh off the base."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю вас. К сожалению, люди губернатора оказались не готовы к местным опасностям..." {n}Дознаватель бросает взгляд на обмякшее тело в цветах губернаторской стражи и коротко вздыхает.{/n} "...а мои способности не позволяют извлекать обломки клинков из живота. Я рассчитываю, что свита Вольного Торговца лучше подготовлена к испытаниям, нежели обычные вояки из штаба".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you. Regrettably, the governor's people showed themselves unprepared for the perils of this place—" {n}The Interrogator glances at the limp body clad in the colours of the governor's guard, and sighs briefly.{/n} "—and extracting blade shards from a person's stomach is beyond my powers. I'm counting on a Rogue Trader's retinue proving a better match for the challenge than common soldiers from the headquarters."

"Thank you. Regrettably, the governor's people showed themselves unprepared for the perils of this place—" {n}The Interrogator glances at the limp body clad in the colours of the governor's guard, and sighs briefly.{/n} "—and extracting blade shards from a person's stomach is beyond my powers. I'm counting on a Rogue Trader's retinue proving a better match for the challenge than common soldiers from the headquarters."

I hope that a Rogue Trader's retinue will prove more capable than a group of soldiers fresh off the base."

I hope that a Rogue Trader's retinue will prove more capable than a group of soldiers fresh off the base."

Regrettably, the governor's people showed themselves to be unprepared for the perils of this place." {n}The Interrogator glances at the limp body clad in the colours of the governor's wardens, and sighs briefly.{/n} "And extracting blade shards from a person's stomach is beyond my powers. I hope that a Rogue Trader's retinue will prove more capable than a group of soldiers fresh off the base."

languages.text: “谢谢你。遗憾的是，总督的手下让我看到，他们对这片土地上的危机没有丝毫准备。”{n}这位审讯官看了一眼地上穿着总督府制服的守卫尸体，轻轻叹了口气。{/n}“我没办法将碎掉的刀刃从别人肚子里取出来。我希望行商浪人的同行，会比一群刚刚离开基地的新兵更加行之有效。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you. Regrettably, the governor's people showed themselves to be unprepared for the perils of this place." {n}The Interrogator glances at the limp body clad in the colours of the governor's wardens, and sighs briefly.{/n} "And extracting blade shards from a person's stomach is beyond my powers. I hope that a Rogue Trader's retinue will prove more capable than a group of soldiers fresh off the base."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你。遗憾的是，总督的手下让我看到，他们对这片土地上的危机没有丝毫准备。”{n}这位审讯官看了一眼地上穿着总督府制服的守卫尸体，轻轻叹了口气。{/n}“我没办法碎掉的刀刃从别人肚子里取出来。我希望行商浪人的同行，会比一群刚刚离开基地的新兵更加行之有效。”

languages.text: 「感謝します。残念なことに、総督の部下たちは、この地の危険に対する備えがないことがわかりました」{n}インテロゲイターは、総督府の監視員の服をまとい、身を横たえた身体ををちらりと見て、短くため息をつく。{/n}「腹から刃の破片を取り出すのは、我の力では無理です。基地を出たばかりの兵士たちよりも、自由開拓者の従者の方が有能であることを証明してくれることを期待しましょう」
languages.original_text: "Thank you. Regrettably, the governor's people showed themselves to be unprepared for the perils of this place." {n}The Interrogator glances at the limp body clad in the colours of the governor's wardens, and sighs briefly.{/n} "And extracting blade shards from a person's stomach is beyond my powers. I hope that a Rogue Trader's retinue will prove more capable than a group of soldiers fresh off the base."

traits.locale_text: 「感謝する。残念なことに、総督の部下たちは、この地の危険に対する備えがないことがわかった」{n}インテロゲイターは、総督府の監視員の服をまとい、身を横たえた身体ををちらりと見て、短くため息をつく。{/n}「腹から刃の破片を取り出すのは、私の力では無理だ。基地を出たばかりの兵士たちよりも、ローグトレーダーの従者の方が有能であることを証明してくれることを期待しよう」

languages.text: "Danke. Bedauerlicherweise haben sich die Leute des Gouverneurs als unvorbereitet für die Gefahren dieses Orts erwiesen." {n}Der Interrogator wirft einen Blick auf den regungslosen Körper in den Farben der Gouverneurswächter und seufzt kurz.{/n} "Und Klingensplitter aus dem Bauch einer Person zu entfernen, übersteigt meine Kräfte. Hoffentlich erweist sich die Gefolgschaft {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} als fähiger als ein Trupp Soldaten frisch aus der Basis."
languages.original_text: "Thank you. Regrettably, the governor's people showed themselves to be unprepared for the perils of this place." {n}The Interrogator glances at the limp body clad in the colours of the governor's wardens, and sighs briefly.{/n} "And extracting blade shards from a person's stomach is beyond my powers. I hope that a Rogue Trader's retinue will prove more capable than a group of soldiers fresh off the base."

traits.locale_text: "Danke. Bedauerlicherweise haben sich die Leute des Gouverneurs als unvorbereitet für die Gefahren dieses Orts erwiesen." {n}Der Interrogator wirft einen Blick auf den regungslosen Körper in den Farben der Gouverneurswächter und seufzt kurz.{/n} "Und Klingensplitter aus dem Bauch einer Person zu entfernen, übersteigt meine Kräfte. Hoffentlich erweist sich die Gefolgschaft {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} als fähiger als ein Trupp Soldaten frisch aus der Basis."

languages.text: « Je vous en remercie. Malheureusement, les gens du gouverneur n'étaient pas préparés à affronter les dangers de cet endroit. » {n}L'interrogateur jette un coup d'œil au cadavre paré des couleurs de la garde du gouverneur, et pousse un léger soupir.{/n} « Et extraire des fragments de métal de l'estomac d'une personne est au-delà de mes compétences. J'espère que l'entourage d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} se montrera plus compétent qu'un groupe de soldats à peine sortis de l'école. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you. Regrettably, the governor's people showed themselves to be unprepared for the perils of this place." {n}The Interrogator glances at the limp body clad in the colours of the governor's wardens, and sighs briefly.{/n} "And extracting blade shards from a person's stomach is beyond my powers. I hope that a Rogue Trader's retinue will prove more capable than a group of soldiers fresh off the base."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous en remercie. Malheureusement, les gens du gouverneur n'étaient pas préparés à affronter les dangers de cet endroit. » {n}L'interrogateur jette un coup d'œil au cadavre paré des couleurs de la garde du gouverneur, et pousse un léger soupir.{/n} « Et extraire des fragments de métal de l'estomac d'une personne est au-delà de mes compétences. J'espère que l'entourage d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} se montrera plus compétent qu'un groupe de soldats à peine sortis de l'école. »

languages.text: «Se lo agradezco. Por desgracia, el personal del gobernador demostró no estar preparado para los peligros de este lugar». {n}El interrogador observa el cuerpo inmóvil con la vestimenta de los alguaciles del gobernador y suspira ligeramente.{/n} «Y extraer fragmentos de espada del estómago de una persona está más allá de mis conocimientos. Espero que la comitiva de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente esté mejor capacitada que un grupo de soldados recién salidos de la base».
languages.original_text: "Thank you. Regrettably, the governor's people showed themselves to be unprepared for the perils of this place." {n}The Interrogator glances at the limp body clad in the colours of the governor's wardens, and sighs briefly.{/n} "And extracting blade shards from a person's stomach is beyond my powers. I hope that a Rogue Trader's retinue will prove more capable than a group of soldiers fresh off the base."

Espero que la comitiva de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente esté mejor capacitada que un grupo de soldados recién salidos de la base».

Regrettably, the governor's people showed themselves to be unprepared for the perils of this place." {n}The Interrogator glances at the limp body clad in the colours of the governor's wardens, and sighs briefly.{/n} "And extracting blade shards from a person's stomach is beyond my powers. I hope that a Rogue Trader's retinue will prove more capable than a group of soldiers fresh off the base."

languages.text: "Teşekkür ederim. Ne yazık ki valinin adamları, buranın tehlikelerine hazırlıksız olduklarını gösterdi." {n}Sorgucu, valinin dizdarlarının üniformasına bürünmüş cansız bedene bakıp hafifçe iç çekiyor.{/n} "Ayrıca insanların karnından bıçak parçası çıkarmak, gücümün ötesinde. Umarım Hür Tacir'in maiyetindekiler, üslerinden dışarı ilk kez adım atmış bir grup askerden daha beceriklidir."
languages.original_text: "Thank you. Regrettably, the governor's people showed themselves to be unprepared for the perils of this place." {n}The Interrogator glances at the limp body clad in the colours of the governor's wardens, and sighs briefly.{/n} "And extracting blade shards from a person's stomach is beyond my powers. I hope that a Rogue Trader's retinue will prove more capable than a group of soldiers fresh off the base."

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkür ederim. Ne yazık ki valinin adamları, buranın tehlikelerine hazırlıksız olduklarını gösterdi." {n}Sorgucu, vali muhafızlarının üniformasına bürünmüş cansız bedene bakıp hafifçe iç çekiyor.{/n} "Ayrıca insanların karnından bıçak parçası çıkarmak, gücümün ötesinde. Umarım Hür Tacir'in maiyetindekiler, üslerinden dışarı ilk kez adım atmış bir grup askerden daha beceriklidir."
